events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position and our review process will begin shortly.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering department, specifically targeting software development roles.
A recruiter specializing in Engineering has been assigned to your case and will reach out to you with further details soon.
We conducted your initial screening interview focusing on your software development experience and enthusiasm for the role.
Thank you for providing detailed answers during the screening; your responses demonstrate a good fit with our technical requirements.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 12th, where you will discuss coding challenges and system design scenarios.
